force2:lightning:test:install.description: install Lightning Testing Service unmanaged package in your org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

releaseversion.name: releaseversion
releaseversion.description: release version of Lightning Testing Service

packagetype.name: packagetype
packagetype.description: type of unmanaged package. 'full' option contains both jasmine and mocha, plus examples

wait.name: wait
wait.description: number of minutes to wait for installation status

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

resultformat.name: resultformat
resultformat.description: test result format emitted to stdout; --json flag overrides this parameter

appname.name: appname
appname.description: name of your Lightning test application

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: directory path to store test run artifacts: for example, log files and test results

configfile.name: configfile
configfile.description: path to config file for the test

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: time (ms) to wait for results element in dom
